name: Tiketeeboo
description:
Ticketeeboo is a ticket sale platform that offers initial ticket sales and creates a fair trusted secondary tickets market.

The secondary market for tickets is a real mess. We have developed a product which fixes the market for the benefit of the users and the event targeting music and sports industries.

Applications for mobile phones available on Android and IOS.

jobs.title: Managing Director
jobs.description:
We are looking for a Managing Director to join our team.

We are working on a new ticket sale platform that will create a fair secondary market to guarantee reasonable pricing and secure ticket purchasing.

The key responsibility will be building a partner relationship with music artists and sports management to quickly develop the business.

The successful applicant must have a proven track record in an internet startup.

You will work closely with the founder and CTO of the project.
